Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the bias of Snopes.com, stating that it is an "extremely liberal propaganda site" with an agenda to discredit anything conservative.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide any evidence or factual support for the accusation against Snopes.com.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the partnership between Snopes.com and Facebook is evidence of bias, without providing any justification for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the partnership between Snopes.com and Facebook, such as the aim to combat fake news and misinformation.
